QAPair.Question: Do you have information about CT scan
QAPair.Answer: A computed tomography (CT) scan is an imaging method that uses x-rays to create pictures of cross-sections of the body. Related tests include: Abdominal and pelvis CT scan , Cranial or head CT scan , Cervical, thoracic, and lumbosacral spine CT scan , Orbit CT scan , Chest CT scan , CT angiogram,
